name: JavaFX Plugin
summary: Maven plugin to run JavaFX 11+ applications.
description: The JavaFX plugin allows you to execute JavaFX applications via Maven, independent of whether the application is a modular or non-modular application.

name: GluonFX Plugin
summary: Create native apps for desktop or mobile devices.
description: GluonFX plugin for Maven leverages GraalVM, OpenJDK and JavaFX, by compiling your application to native code.
tags: maven, plugin, gluon, mobile, embedded, iOS, android, iPhone, iPad, graalvm, native

name: Scenic View
summary: Inspect / debug the scene graph of your application.
description: Scenic View is a JavaFX application designed to make it simple to understand the current state of your application scene graph.

name: Scene Builder
summary: WYSIWYG editor for building your user interface.
description: Scene builder is an editor for rapid application development via drag and drop.
tags: UI builder, WYSIWYG, editor, user interface, client

name: JPro
summary: Deploy and run your applications in browsers.
description: JPro is a solution that allows you to run your JavaFX application inside browsers.
tags: web, browser, web app, web application

name: Gluon Mobile
summary: Deploy to mobile devices like iPhones, iPads, or Android.
description: Gluon Mobile Provides Fresh, Modern UIs, and Cloud Connectivity.

name: Gluon Start
summary: Generate the structure and skeleton of your Java client application.
description: Gluon Start is a website which enables you to generate the structure and skeleton of your Java client application.

name: ShowcaseFX
summary: A view for developing JavaFX stylesheets.
description: ShowcaseFX is a tool designed for previewing and developing JavaFX stylesheets, allowing users to overlay multiple stylesheets on the modena theme. It can run standalone or integrate into apps.

name: TestFX
summary: A unit testing framework for JavaFX.
description: Flexible setup and cleanup of JavaFX test fixtures. Simple robots to simulate user interactions.

name: CSSFX
description: CSSFX enhances developer productivity by providing CSS reloading functionality in your running application.

name: FXSampler
description: FXSampler is a small framework for creating a consistent set of samples for the controls contained within a JavaFX library.

name: FXIconCreator
summary: Tool for creating icons for Windows, Linux, OSX
description: Small app to create icon sets (multi resolution) for Linux, Windows, OSX from a single PNG image.

name: QF-Test
summary: Automated GUI testing for Java, Web and Windows applications
description: QF-Test is a fully integrated tool for automated GUI testing for Java, Web and Windows applications.

name: Conveyor
summary: Build self-updating desktop app packages in minutes. Package for every OS from any OS.
description: Conveyor makes distributing JavaFX apps as easy as for a web app. It builds self-updating packages/installers, fully signed or self signed and for every desktop OS.

name: WebFX
description: WebFX is a JavaFX application transpiler powered by GWT. It can transpile a JavaFX application into a traditional self-contained pure JavaScript web app.
tags: web, javascript, GWT, transpile, browser, games
